ca.ualberta.team10projectw2014.controllersAndViews

Class CreateCommentActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity
      • ca.ualberta.team10projectw2014.controllersAndViews.CreateCommentActivity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CommentContentEditing

    public class CreateCommentActivity
extends Activity
implements CommentContentEditing
    Version:
    1 (current version number of program)

    This class deals with creating comments by talking with the app's singleton. This is where the location of a comment, its picture, and any textual contents will be set.

    Author:
    Bradley Poulette
